Question: Shenzhen Dbs Technology Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Dbs Technology Co., Ltd

Product: Unveiled latest consumer electronic products and innovative technologies at CES 2024

- Showcased cutting-edge consumer electronics and innovative technologies
- Featured products in areas such as 5G, AI, AR/VR, robotics, smart home, and vehicle technology
- Highlighted advanced imaging solutions, laser display technology, and Light Detection and Ranging (LiDAR) technology
- Demonstrated car-integrated and home appliances with integrated projection curtain and ALPD 5.0 super full-color laser technology
Summary_cn:
深圳德必胜科技有限公司

产品: 在2024年的CES上展示最新的消费电子产品和创新技术

- 展示尖端的消费电子产品和创新技术
- 重点介绍5G、人工智能(AI)、增强现实/虚拟现实(AR/VR)、机器人、智能家居和车辆技术等领域的产品
- 突出先进的成像解决方案、激光投影技术和光学雷达(LiDAR)技术
- 展示了集成投影幕布和ALPD 5.0超全色激光技术的车载和家用电器产品
